duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide line support for assembly and escalate safety and process quality issues.
Monitors & trouble shoots electrical & mechanical equipment used in the process of building hydrostatic pumps, motors, and components.
Disassembles, overhauls, and rebuilds production equipment under supervision.
Assist in the daily activities of implementing process changes and problem solving on the shop floor.
Apply solid computer skills to access and input data via computer interface or automated equipment.
Utilize reading and comprehension skills to follow documented build instructions.
